content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/encode/starlette.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image as a parent image
FROM python:3.11

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install dependencies from requirements.txt
RUN pip install -r requirements.txt

# Install the additional ASGI server
RUN pip install uvicorn

# Run the test suite to verify the installation
RUN scripts/test
